module.name: sfkpreloader
module.displayName: SFK Preloader - Page Loading Image - Page Loading Animation - Preloading Screen - Loading Page.
module.description: The module helps to add image on all website pages a preloader, also known, as a loading page, or preloading screen it’s the loading animation or static image that shows on the website while the page is loading in the background.
module.author: Shahab
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to remove this module?
